product.title: Turin 25mm Pure White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
product.description: Their range of turin 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This pure white perfect fit venetian blind adds a fresh white shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with bright accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are a drill-free and screw-free way to fit blinds to a upvc window or door - ensuring the frame warranty is protected.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. relproducts.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Roma Pure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The snowy white of the roma pure is fresh and cool, allowing plenty of light in from outside, yet offering privacy and neutrality. The fabric is lightweight and durable, making it the ideal option for a blind that could get a lot of use. Light, airy living rooms make beautiful entertainment spaces, and this blind will only help to set that off. The soft hue won't clash in an all-white environment, and also creates an excellent colour break when teamed with bright colours such as emerald greens, poppy reds, and sky blues.

relproducts.title: Richmond Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

relproducts.title: Decor Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

relproducts.title: Henderson Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

relproducts.title: Rochester Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

relproducts.title: Roma Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

relproducts.title: Amor Icing Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The amor pure is the next shade up from the amor snowfall in terms of whiteness. In keeping with its name, the amor pure is that slightly off-white colour of paper or fluffy white cloud. All blinds in the amor range are 100% blackout so they are perfect for blocking out the light in a bedroom. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

relproducts.title: Gloss Pure Brilliant White Real Wood
relproducts.description: The gloss range is the ultimate in sophistication; we have taken the timeless appearance of the wooden blind and given it a modern funky twist. This white gloss blind will add a stylish, fresh and crisp feel in any room in your home, the gloss finish adds an extra touch of chic. relproducts.title: Pure Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any white upvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

relproducts.title: Polar Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: An off-white shade, thepolar white25mm perfect fit blindis the perfect addition to any living space. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

relproducts.title: Snow White Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: The gorgeous pleated snow white honeycomb dimout perfect fit blind is simple, stylish and versatile. Its elegant white can be paired in an endless amount of ways, to add a modern, classy feel to its paired window. You simply cant go wrong with a clean, crisp white blind struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.
